classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: ANT201, or GEOG150.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, Lower-Division F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units).
